question: Jnanpith Awardee Poet Akkitham Achuthan Namboothiri, who died recently, belongs to which state?
explanation:
Renowned Poet Akkitham Achuthan Namboothiri of Kerala, died at the age of 94. He was awarded the Jnanpith Award, the highest literary award in India. He was popularly known as Akkitham and had penned his first poem when he was 8 years old.
He was instrumental in modernising Malayalam poetry. He was also a social reformer and a follower of Gandhian Principles.
